I can offer you the following buffs, if you're below Lv. 91.
Horn Melody / Drum Melody / Pipe Organ Melody Guitar Melody / Harp Melody / Lute Melody Prevailing Sonata / Daring Sonaka / Refreshing Sonata
You can receive the above buffs as a group.
For Knight's Harmony / Warrior's Harmony / Wizard's Harmoney, you will have to choose one.
